rev.comment: /* Conviction */ esamskriti provides second hand data and mentions no source - it concludes with a Pro Sanatan (Hindu) statement and the data therefore could be biased
/* The role of the Central and the Gujarat state government in the riots */ There is a difference between just one opinion and "many experts opinion"
/* The role of the Central and the Gujarat state government in the riots */
/* Criticism of the "Final Solution" Documentary */ Which third parties - except BJP and Sangh Parivar none has questioned .. See the links below more have made even greater charges
/* Related to main story */ rv'ed CAG link. CAG is an illegitiate POV org of anti-Hindus (not recognized as an advocacy group)
/* Films on the riots */ Islamists dont get seats in UN bodies - Should be Islamic
/* Films on the riots */ Added a criticism section. Working on more details
/* Newspaper articles */ You removed the wrong one mate
Removed a redundant link. Oh, and to 62.189.60.30, get a login. That way the NSA can know which school you plan to bomb next
/* Films on the riots */ Removed all that 'banned' stuff. Please provide links to documents proving this claim of being 'banned' (or get some forged ones from uncle Osama, Ahmed)
/* Films on the riots */ How can you identify "left leaning Filmmakers - Link to a news story to prove
/* Films on the riots */ If you wish to add the BJP ideas - add it as a separate para and link to a news story - otherwise it is your own POV
/* Films on the riots */ " that is supposed ? - The filmmaker has explicitly said it is a film on Gujarat riots and it is publicly accepted that this is a film on Gujarat Riots.
/* Films on the riots */ Writing - it may or may not be an original version is enough to warn the readers.Anything more is adding your own personal POV
/* Films on the riots */ Please present proof (affidavits, documents etc) that the CBFC banned this alleged "documentary"
/* Films on the riots */ Removed liberal POV. CBFC does not have authority to 'ban' films, only to withdraw them from public circulation. What are they, the Gestapo? No melodramatics, please.
/* Unrelated to main story */ REmoving pointless Paswan story
/* Films on the riots */ Removed wililink to 'Final Solution". It links to the Endlösung der Judenfrage (holocaust) and is irrelevant to this article
rv'ed the phrase 'banned'. Political parties can't 'ban' films in a democracy (read abt da-vinci code). This is India, not Iran,folks.
Term formerly is misleading when there is a Court case to decide if a temple existed there
